result.execSummary:
The defendant Courtney C Boyds was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery by Prisoners, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.20(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.  Submit DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: Sentencing Hearing on 8-2-16 filed by court reporter Chris Champeau
Columbia County Court Conviction DNA - DNA taken

Defendant Courtney C Boyds in court, in custody with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Cases called: 15CF189 and 15CF512.  Both parties have received copy of PSI.  Sentencing recommendations/arguments held.  Court sentenced defendant on 15CF189 to serve 11 years in prison, 6 years initial confinement, and 5 years extended supervision.  Conditions of extended supervision include: Submit DNA sample.  Costs $518.00.  432 days credit.  No contact with any victims.  Complete a mental health evaluation.  AODA and comply.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Defendant is eligible for the challenge incarceration program and substance abuse program.  15CF512 Court withheld sentencing, placed defendant on probation for 3 years consecutive to 15CF189.  Submit DNA sample. $518.00 costs.   11:06/12:06.
filed by agent.
Filed by Atty Roger Klopp

Cases called: 15CF189 & 15CF512, Defendant Courtney C Boyds in court, in custody with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Information filed in 15CF189. Reading waived. Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count one in each case. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment. PSI to be completed within 60 days.  Argued sentencing to be set. Bond revoked.

Defendant Courtney C Boyds in court, in custody with attorney Roger L. Klopp. Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over. Atty. Klopp stated waiver is based upon an offer.   Information filed, reading waived. Defendant stood mute. Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set. Bond continued. Twenty days to file motions.

Defendant Courtney C Boyds in court, in custody with attorney Roger L. Klopp, requested reset.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 24, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 14, 2016 at 04:00 pm.

Defendant, Courtney C Boyds, appeared in custody with Atty. Benavides special for today. Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin. $5,000 cash bond with felony conds. DNA sample to be submitted. Time limits waived. Current address given: Columbia County Jail.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
